name: Exorcise Devito's Ghost
description:
Follow our adrogynous protagonist Gun on his very short quest to exorcise Danny Devito's many ghosts and save the world from AI.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move

Mouse to shoot/look

M to toggle mute

(This is a glorified Construct 2 Tutorial game. Sometimes the ending (which is at 500 points) doesn't trigger. I think I fixed it but I'm not sure.)
